data.process: Welfare advice, ESOL and Older Women's Group require appointments (email or phone). Domestic violence support is accessible via drop-in.
data.day: MON/TUE (Welfare Advice): Appointment only. TUE and THU (ESOL): 10am - 12pm. THU: (Domestic Violence support, drop-in): 9.30am - 5pm, THU: Older Women's Social Group:  10am -2pm.
data.services: Support services for Asian women. Staff speak Bengali, English, Hindi and Urdu.
